programme.title: Viesnīca "Diženā Budapešta"
programme.desc: Viesnīca "Diženā Budapešta" stāsta par Eiropā slavenās viesnīcas leģendārā viesmīļa Gustava H un portjē Zero Mustafa piedzīvojumiem. Viesnīcas darbinieki kļūst par lieciniekiem nenovērtējamas renesanses gleznas zādzībai, kādas bagātas ģimenes cīņai par milzīgu mantojumu un dramatiskām izmaiņām, kuras notiek Eiropā periodā starp diviem pasaules kariem.

programme.title: Mēness Lēkta Karaļvalsts
programme.desc: Tajā ir bāka, skautu kustības zēni, sentimentāls policijas kapteinis, kautrīgs skautu vadītājs, ekscentriski neveiksminieki vecāki, nelietīga sociālā dienesta darbiniece un Šekspīra lugu cienīgas kaislības, kas, brāžoties no ekrāna, kā viļņi vētrā apņem skatītājus.

programme.title: Nebraska
programme.desc: Vecais kara veterāns Vudijs ir saņēmis vēstuli, ka ir laimējis miljonu dolāru. Viņš vairākkārt aizlavās no mājām un apņēmīgi soļo uz Linkolnu, kas atrodas tūkstošiem kilometru attālumā, lai to saņemtu, bet vienmēr tiek apturēts. Dēls Deivids apžēlojas un ved viņu ar auto. Pa ceļam, satiekot cilvēkus no viņa pagātnes, atklājas patiesais Vudija dzīvesstāsts, mīlas attiecības, kara traumas, neveiksmes biznesā. Mazliet jautrā un arī skumjā melnā komēdija uzņemta melnbaltās krāsās un ir nominēta Oskaram sešās kategorijās, kā arī ieguvusi daudzus prestižus kino apbalvojumus.

programme.title: Viesnīca "Diženā Budapešta"
programme.desc: Viesnīca "Diženā Budapešta" stāsta par Eiropā slavenās viesnīcas leģendārā viesmīļa Gustava H un portjē Zero Mustafa piedzīvojumiem. Viesnīcas darbinieki kļūst par lieciniekiem nenovērtējamas renesanses gleznas zādzībai, kādas bagātas ģimenes cīņai par milzīgu mantojumu un dramatiskām izmaiņām, kuras notiek Eiropā periodā starp diviem pasaules kariem.

programme.title: Mēness Lēkta Karaļvalsts
programme.desc: Tajā ir bāka, skautu kustības zēni, sentimentāls policijas kapteinis, kautrīgs skautu vadītājs, ekscentriski neveiksminieki vecāki, nelietīga sociālā dienesta darbiniece un Šekspīra lugu cienīgas kaislības, kas, brāžoties no ekrāna, kā viļņi vētrā apņem skatītājus.

programme.title: Mēness Lēkta Karaļvalsts
programme.desc: Tajā ir bāka, skautu kustības zēni, sentimentāls policijas kapteinis, kautrīgs skautu vadītājs, ekscentriski neveiksminieki vecāki, nelietīga sociālā dienesta darbiniece un Šekspīra lugu cienīgas kaislības, kas, brāžoties no ekrāna, kā viļņi vētrā apņem skatītājus.

programme.title: Aiz kraujas rudzu laukā
programme.desc: "Aiz kraujas rudzu laukā" ir ieskats notikumos, kas veidoja vienu no pretrunīgākajiem un noslēpumainākajiem amerikāņu rakstniekiem – Dž. D. Selindžeru. Filmas darbība risinās 20. gadsimta vidū Ņujorkā, kad jaunais Selindžers meklē savu vietu dzīvē. Pārciestais frontē 2. Pasaules karā, mīlas dēka ar augstāko aprindu jaunkundzi Ūnu ONīlu un pirmie literārie centieni – šī pieredze ir pamatā viņa pasaulē, iespējams, slavenākajam literārajam meistardarbam "Uz kraujas rudzu laukā". Galvenās lomas atveido jaunais britu aktieris Nikolass Holts un sevi jau pierādījušais ASV kino meistars Kevins Speisijs.

programme.title: Vīriešu siržu valdzinātāja
programme.desc: Romantiska drāma, kas uzņemta politiski uzlādētajā 60. gadu pirmajā pusē. Kāda sieviete atgriezusies savās mājās dienvidos, un atklāj, ka viņas iespējas ir būtiski ierobežotas. Ar palīdzību no Kongresa viņai izdodas aizsākt vēsturisku normatīvo aktu pieņemšanu, kas palīdzēs turpmāk sievietēm iegūt tādas iespējas un aizsardzību, kāda līdz šim nav bijusi.

programme.title: Puisis
programme.desc: Jauns žurnālists Gotjērs uzzinājis, ka viņš ir franču popdziedātāja Gaja Džemeta ārlaulības dēls. Kamēr veco laiku zvaigzne dodas tūrē, lai reklamētu savu jauno albumu, Gotjērs nolemj sekot viņam aizkulisēs, uz skatuves un ceļā. Viņa iegansts - viņš it kā filmē dokumentālo filmu par mūziķa karjeru.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone Plus?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone Plus filmām.

programme.title: Santas Baking Blizzard
programme.desc: Combining edibility and artistry, Americas best bakers team up with expert ice sculptors to create phenomenal Christmas-themed cakes. Hosted by Casey Webb, who presents each episodes teams with their tricky challenges, the series pushes these bakers talents to the limit, as each team hopes to impress the judges and move on to the finale, where a whopping $25,000 is up for grabs.

programme.title: Holiday Wars
programme.desc: Hosted by Jonathan Bennett, Holiday Wars is a creative game show where three teams of confectionary connoisseurs demonstrate their astonishing talents by crafting mind-boggling, edible displays. With revered pastry chef Shinmin Li serving as the shows judge, the teams must whip up a display worthy of her immaculate standards if they wish to be crowned the winner. Each episode presents new holiday-themed challenges for the teams to complete, as they use their culinary prowess to produce mesmerising, delicious displays.

programme.title: Holiday Gingerbread Showdown
programme.desc: Three bakers compete to win a mammoth $25,000 by creating spectacular gingerbread cakes based on a scene from a famous movie in this scrumptious cooking show. After being given their respective scenes which they must replicate as perfectly as possible, the judges will asses their edible creations and decide who has impressed the most. These delectable showpieces are as extravagant as they are intricate, with the bakers meticulously detailing each aspect of their respective scenes. One baker will be selected to compete in the finale, where they will have a chance of winning the whopping cash prize.

programme.title: Holiday Gingerbread Showdown

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Holiday Baking Championship
programme.desc: The search to find the greatest holiday baker begins as eight amateur bakers enter the kitchen, where they show off their family traditions and superb baking skills. To survive the challenges from week to week, they must prove their abilities in front of our tough-love judges: Duff Goldman, Nancy Fuller and Lorraine Pascale. Hosted by Bobby Deen, this baking championship is the sweetest way to celebrate this holiday season.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay: Holiday Throwdown
programme.desc: Sunny Anderson takes Bobby Flay on a trip around the world with chefs Gabe Bertaccini, Marcus Samuelsson and Maneet Chauhan. Each round, the acclaimed chefs celebrate ingredients that are commonly found at holiday markets across the globe.

A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay: Holiday Throwdown
programme.desc: Sunny Anderson takes Bobby Flay on a trip around the world with chefs Gabe Bertaccini, Marcus Samuelsson and Maneet Chauhan. Each round, the acclaimed chefs celebrate ingredients that are commonly found at holiday markets across the globe.

programme.title: Holiday Gingerbread Showdown
programme.desc: Three bakers compete to win a mammoth $25,000 by creating spectacular gingerbread cakes based on a scene from a famous movie in this scrumptious cooking show. After being given their respective scenes which they must replicate as perfectly as possible, the judges will asses their edible creations and decide who has impressed the most. These delectable showpieces are as extravagant as they are intricate, with the bakers meticulously detailing each aspect of their respective scenes. One baker will be selected to compete in the finale, where they will have a chance of winning the whopping cash prize.

programme.title: Santas Baking Blizzard
programme.desc: Combining edibility and artistry, Americas best bakers team up with expert ice sculptors to create phenomenal Christmas-themed cakes. Hosted by Casey Webb, who presents each episodes teams with their tricky challenges, the series pushes these bakers talents to the limit, as each team hopes to impress the judges and move on to the finale, where a whopping $25,000 is up for grabs.

programme.title: Holiday Baking Championship
programme.desc: The search to find the greatest holiday baker begins as eight amateur bakers enter the kitchen, where they show off their family traditions and superb baking skills. To survive the challenges from week to week, they must prove their abilities in front of our tough-love judges: Duff Goldman, Nancy Fuller and Lorraine Pascale. Hosted by Bobby Deen, this baking championship is the sweetest way to celebrate this holiday season.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Selena + Chef: Home For the Holidays
programme.desc: Selena and Chef Alex Guarnaschelli prepare for her tree-trimming party. The feast includes mozzarella sticks, black pepper roast beef and chocolate candy cane bark.

programme.title: Selena + Chef: Home For the Holidays
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 3. Culinary show.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Arī divi ir ģimene
programme.desc: Bezrūpīgā brunču mednieka Semjuela dzīvē viss ir vienkārši un viegli, taču kādā jaukā dienā ar mazuli uz rokām uzrodas viena no viņa neskaitāmajām draudzenēm Kristīna. Paziņojusi, ka tā ir viņa meita, Kristīna aizlido uz Londonu, atstājot Semu vienu ar bērniņu. Pēkšņi par tēvu kļuvušais Sems, vēl neatguvies no šoka, kopā ar mazulīti lido uz Angliju cerībā uzmeklēt meitenītes māti. Tā kā meklējumi ir nesekmīgi, Semam atliek vien samierināties ar jauno tēva lomu un vienam audzināt meitu. Taču pēc astoņiem gadiem meitenītes māte tomēr uzrodas….

programme.title: "Back to Black"
programme.desc: Filma "Back to Black" ir stāsts par 21.gs. zvaigzni Eimiju Vainhausu no pusaudzes gadiem līdz pasaulslavenā albuma "Back to Black" tapšanai, atklājot neatkārtojamo radošo dzirksti, asprātību un atklātību, kā arī cenšoties izprast viņas dēmonus. Albums "Back To Black" ieguva 5 Grammy balvas, un ir viens no visvairāk pārdotajiem albumiem. Tajā ir Eimijas sirdspuksti, skaļāki ar katru sirdssāpi, katra dziesma ir viņas un Bleika mīlas stāsts.

programme.title: After. Pēc kritiena
programme.desc: Tesa ir gatava jaunam dzīves posmam. Spožais prestižas koledžas diploms paver jaunas iespējas – meitene atrod sapņu darbu starptautiskā kompānijā. Viņas nodoms pārcelties uz Sietlu nemaz neiepriecina Hārdinu. Viņa neapmierinātība, pārmetumi un mūžīgā greizsirdība sāpīgi ievaino Tesu un rada bažas. Vai ir vērts visu likt uz kārts un upurēt daudzsološu karjeru? Taču kā lai aizmirst kopā pavadītās naktis un kaislīgos skūpstus, viņa ciešos vīrieša apskāvienus un tuvību, kas padara traku?

programme.title: Padibenes
programme.desc: Kādreizējais kriminālnoziedznieks atkal sastopas ar savu pagātni, kad viņa mierīgajā un savrupajā dzīvē ierodas bijusī sieva un citi radi.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets 2: Atkusnis
programme.desc: Laika ziņas: Tuvākās piecas dienas ir gaidāmi lieli plūdi, kam sekos pasaules gals. Iespējams, nedēļas beigās varētu izlauzties kāds saules stariņš… Mamutam Manijam, sliņķim Sidam, zobenzobu tīģerim Djego, zobenzobu vāverei Skratam un pārējiem Ledus laikmeta iemītniekiem ir sajūta, ka viņu kūstošā pasaule sāk palikt pārāk slapja un ledus kalns, kas apdraud ieleju, tūlīt lūzīs. Taču tā nav vienīgā problēma – Manijs vairs nevēlas būt viens pats, taču ir pamatotas aizdomas, ka viņš ir pēdējais mamuts. Atkal ir jādodas ceļā, kur tiek satikta valdzinoša mamutiene (iespējams, pēdējā visā pasaulē) Elija, kuru pavada uzņēmīgs oposumu pārītis Krešs un Edijs.

programme.title: Strāvas karš
programme.desc: Dramatisks sāncensības stāsts par elektrības atklāšanas laikmeta titāniem Tomasu Edisonu un Džordžu Vestinghausu, lai noskaidrotu, kura izgudrotā elektriskā sistēma būs noteicošā modernizētajā pasaulē.

programme.title: Dinozauriņš Diplodoks
programme.desc: Titulētais dinozauriņš dodas piedzīvojumā, lai glābtu savus vecākus, kuri pazuduši mīklainos apstākļos. Ceļā viņš sastaps ne vien burvi un divus dīvainus zinātniekus, bet arī fantastiskas būtnes un nokļūs apbrīnojamās vietās.

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Zvirbulis Ričijs kopš dzimšanas pieņemts stārķu ģimenē, visi viņu ļoti mīl, viņš ātri aug un jūtas kā īsts stārķis. Taču gājputniem stārķiem pienāk laiks lidot uz Āfriku, lai tur ziemotu. Ģimene ir spiesta atklāt Ričijam viņa izcelšanos, jo lidot kopā nedrīkst – grūtajā ceļojumā zvirbulis var iet bojā. Drosminieks negrasās nolaist spārnus un nolemj visiem pierādīt, ka ir īsts stārķis. Ričijs viens pats dodas ceļā, un viņam pievienojas jauni draugi – pūce Olga un papagailis Kiki.

programme.title: Alita: Kaujas eņģelis
programme.desc: Pasauli iznīcinājis Lielais karš, sagraujot ikvienu pilsētu savā ceļā, izņemot to, zem kuras trīssimt gadu laikā ir izaugusi vēl viena, kur iedzīvotāji cīnās par labklājības druskām no virszemes. Apakšējās pilsētas izgāztuvē tādējādi nonāk arī kādas kiborgmeitenes atliekas, un doktoram Ido šķiet, ka viņa ir pārsteidzoši līdzīga briesmīgajiem kaujas eņģeļiem, kas reiz piedalījās Lielajā karā.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets: Lielā sadursme
programme.desc: Skreta (Kriss Vedžs) nepārtrauktie pūliņi noglabāt savu zīli, liek viņam izraisīt negadījumu virkni, kuru rezultātā asteroīdi sāk traukties uz Zemi. Haoss liek Manijam (Rejs Romano), Djego (Deniss Līrijs), Sidam (Džons Legvizamo) un viņu ģimenēm meklēt patvērumu. Piedzīvojumu meklētāja zebiekste Baks (Saimons Pegs) viņus brīdina, ka var sākties masveida izmiršana, kas liek draugiem meklēt jaunu mājvietu, pa ceļam satiekot citus dzīvniekus un apmeklējot eksotiskas vietas.

programme.title: Van Gogs. Pie mūžības vārtiem
programme.desc: Gleznotāja Van Goga dzīvesstāsts par laiku, ko viņš pavadīja Francijā, Arlā.

programme.title: Kā Grinčs nozaga Ziemassvētkus
programme.desc: Vūvila ir maza, brīnumaina pilsētiņa, kas atrodas sniegpārsliņā. Visiem Vūvivas iedzīvotājiem ļoti patīk Ziemassvētki. Taču pilsētiņas tuvumā mīt Grinčs – ļoti nejauks radījums, kuram riebjas gan Ziemassvētki, gan arī vūvilieši, jo tie savulaik viņu izstūmuši no sava vidus. Redzot, kā viņi priecājas un gaida svētkus, Grinčs nolemj nozagt visas Ziemassvētku dāvanas. Bet varbūt kādai mazai meitenītei izdosies sadraudzēties ar Grinču un likt viņam mainīt savus plānus?

programme.title: Ceļotāju paaudze
programme.desc: Viņi ir radīti mēģenē un īpaši gatavoti šai misijai. No šiem cilvēkiem ir atkarīgs visas cilvēces liktenis. Tāltālajā ceļojumā sūtītie jaunieši ir saikne starp pagātnes un nākotnes paaudzēm. Pēc dīvainās jauniešu audzinātāja nāves viņu dzīve kļūst nekontrolēta. Viņi vairs nedzer medikamentus, un viņus pārņem līdz šim svešas cilvēciskas jūtas un vēlmes - mīlestība un kaisle.

programme.title: Kentervilas spoks
programme.desc: Sera Saimona de Kentervila rēgs jau 300 gadus klīst pa savrupmāju, meklēdams drosmīgu pēcnācēju, kurš viņu varētu atbrīvot no Kentervila lāsta. Kad šajā savrupmājā ievācas kāda amerikāņu ģimene, spokam parādās cerību stariņš beidzot tapt atbrīvotam.

programme.title: Bestsellers
programme.desc: Untumains pensionēts rakstnieks negribīgi sāk piedalīties savas pēdējās grāmatas veicināšanas kampaņā, lai izpalīdzētu jaunai izdevējai.

programme.title: Mazulīte
programme.desc: Augsta līmeņa vadītāja liek uz spēles savu karjeru un ģimeni, kad sāk kaislīgas attiecības ar krietni jaunāku praktikantu.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets: Lielā sadursme
programme.desc: Skreta (Kriss Vedžs) nepārtrauktie pūliņi noglabāt savu zīli, liek viņam izraisīt negadījumu virkni, kuru rezultātā asteroīdi sāk traukties uz Zemi. Haoss liek Manijam (Rejs Romano), Djego (Deniss Līrijs), Sidam (Džons Legvizamo) un viņu ģimenēm meklēt patvērumu. Piedzīvojumu meklētāja zebiekste Baks (Saimons Pegs) viņus brīdina, ka var sākties masveida izmiršana, kas liek draugiem meklēt jaunu mājvietu, pa ceļam satiekot citus dzīvniekus un apmeklējot eksotiskas vietas.

programme.title: Kā Grinčs nozaga Ziemassvētkus
programme.desc: Vūvila ir maza, brīnumaina pilsētiņa, kas atrodas sniegpārsliņā. Visiem Vūvivas iedzīvotājiem ļoti patīk Ziemassvētki. programme.title: Tauriņa stāsts
programme.desc: Tuvojoties ziemai, monarhu tauriņi migrē uz dienvidiem, lai pārziemotu siltumā. Taču Patrika spārni vēl nav gatavi tālajam ceļam, un viņš nevar lidot. Nedomādams padoties, Patriks kopā ar savu labāko draugu kāpuru Mārtiju paslēpjas pārtikas treilerī, kuru velk Dženifera. Tomēr arī viņai ir savas bažas par ceļojumu, jo - tauriņam neierasti - viņu māc bailes no augstuma. Visus trīs gaida daudz piedzīvojumu un sūri gūtu mācību, līdz mērķis būs sasniegts.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets 4: Kontinentu dreifs
programme.desc: Skrats netīšām izraisa kontinentālu kataklizmu, kuras rezultātā Menijs tiek nošķirts no Elijas un Persikas. Viņš atrodas uz aisberga kopā ar Djego, Sidu un Omīti, taču apņemas atgriezties mājās. Pēc šiem satriecošajiem notikumiem Sids satiek sen neredzētus ģimenes locekļus, turklāt draugiem būs jātiek galā ar dažādiem jauniem personāžiem, kuri apņēmušies liegt viņiem atgriezties mājās.

programme.title: Pēdējais strēlnieks
programme.desc: 2. pasaules kara veterāns aizbēg no mājām Ziemeļīrijā, dototies grūtā, bet iedvesmojošā ceļojumā uz Franciju, lai piedalītos D dienas 75. atceres gadadienā, un atrod drosmi stāties pretī saviem pagātnes rēgiem.

programme.title: Konklāvs
programme.desc: Pēc pāvesta negaidītās nāves katoļu kardinālu kolēģija sapulcējas Vatikānā uz vēlēšanām, lai izvēlētos jauno pāvestu un iezīmētu jauno baznīcas laikmetu. Aiz Siksta kapelas slēgtajām durvīm kardināli no visas pasaules sacenšas par šo godu rūpīgi sargātā rituālā, kas sakņojas gadsimtiem tālā pagātnē. Kardinālam Lorensam (Reifs Fainss), kardinālu kolēģijas dekānam, ir svētais pienākums pārraudzīt šo konklāvu.

programme.title: Darba rūķis
programme.desc: Levons Keids pameta godalgotu militāro karjeru slepenajās operācijās, lai dzīvotu vienkāršu dzīvi, strādājot celtniecībā. Bet, kad viņa priekšnieka meitu, kas viņam ir kā radiniece, nolaupa cilvēku tirgotāji, viņš atklāj korupcijas pasauli, kas ir daudz lielāka, nekā viņš varēja iedomāties.

programme.title: Kaķu mīlis
programme.desc: Koledžas studente Margo piestrādā nelielā kinoteātrī, kur iepazīstas ar biežu tā apmeklētāju, par sevi vecāko Robertu. Pāri letei aizsāktais flirts pārtop nepārtrauktā čatošanā. Kad abi nonāk līdz randiņam, Margo atklāj, ka dzīvē satiktais Roberts itin nemaz neatbilst tam Robertam, ar kuru viņa flirtējusi īsziņās. Skarbs vēstījums par dzimumu dalījumu, ķepurošanos cauri modernās randiņošanas staignājam un to, kādas bīstamas īpašības mēs mēdzam piedēvēt cilvēkiem otrpus mūsu telefoniem.

programme.title: Cietais rieksts
programme.desc: 4. jūlijā, Neatkarības dienas svētku brīvdienās, valsti apdraud uzbrukums neaizsargātajai ASV infrastruktūrai. Noslēpumainais nozieguma izplānotājs ir pārdomājis visus mūsdienu aizsardzības aspektus, bet nav rēķinājies ar vecā kaluma pretinieku Džonu Makleinu. Bez maskas. Bez apmetņa. Bez problēmām.

programme.title: Pārdozēšana
programme.desc: Filmas notikumi seko Sārai, Tulūzas narkotiku apkarošanas grupas vadītājai, un Ričardam, vietējās kriminālpolicijas bosam. Sāra spiesta sadarboties ar Ričardu, lai apturētu metamfetamīna tirgošanu starp Spāniju un Franciju un atrastu slepkavu, kas saistīts ar šo lietu.

programme.title: LaLiga. Alaves - Real Madrid
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: UFC. Brandon Royval-Manel Kape
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. AS Monaco - Fenerbahce
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Futbols: Bundesliga. St. Pauli - Heidenheim
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.desc: Reality TV show presents further steps taken by the families who achieved their dreams and purchased vacation homes. programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Boise Boys
programme.desc: American reality series following expert renovators Clint Robertson and Luke Caldwell as they transform houses in Boise, Idaho. The pair of best friends make a formidable team, even if they have completely different personalities and outlooks, and they use their skills and experience to flip houses and make a profit. Through their company, Timber and Love, they aim to promote the use of timber in home renovations. With hugely contrasting styles, they get the job done with a little arguing and a lot of hard work, ensuring these homes look better than ever.

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. programme.title: Fixer Upper
programme.desc: American reality television series. Married couple Chip and Johanna Gaines own a home renovation and redecoration service in Waco, Texas, and had worked on over 100 homes before the show. They begin with showing a hopeful couple three potential homes to purchase in central Texas, all of which require a significant amount of repair or renovation. Once the couple have chosen the home they like, Johanna designs the renovations and Chip is the lead contractor. Buyers usually have an overall budget of under $200,000 with at least $30,000 in renovations.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Tiny House, Big Living
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.title: Greatest Heists with Pierce Brosnan
programme.desc: Pierce Brosnan examines how a mob-connected heist crew came away with millions in cash from a southern California bank in 1972.

programme.title: Original Gangsters with Sean Bean
programme.desc: Billy Hill and The Krays. Sean Bean revisits Billy Hill and the Krays, tracing how the twins spent most of their life in jail, while Londons original "Gentleman Gangster" lived out his days as a free man.

programme.title: The UnXplained: Mysteries of the Universe
programme.desc: We humans want to boldly go into uncharted territories to make new discoveries. As the next era of space exploration begins, what will we find when we reach other planets? What dangers will we face when we try to conquer these new frontiers?

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: Pawn Stars

programme.title: Greatest Heists with Pierce Brosnan

programme.title: The UnXplained: Mysteries of the Universe
programme.desc: We humans want to boldly go into uncharted territories to make new discoveries. As the next era of space exploration begins, what will we find when we reach other planets? What dangers will we face when we try to conquer these new frontiers?

programme.title: Mountain Men
programme.desc: There are men in America who must still make their living off the land; hunting and trapping to provide for their families. They are MOUNTAIN MEN. Their very survival is predicated on utilizing ancient skills perfected over hundreds of years. This series features a variety of men from Appalachia to the Rocky Mountains to Alaska and follows them as they race against winter to obtain the sustenance and money needed to make it through the coldest months of the year. Eustace Conway lives deep in the mountains of North Carolina on the "Turtle Bay Reserve." He moved here two decades ago in search of a more "truthful" existence. In the years since, hes built a home, and survived by hunting, fishing and raising animals. Tom Orr lives with his wife on the Yaak River in Montana. He is 100 miles from the nearest town, a place he hasnt ventured to in 10 years. John is a trapper by trade and to prepare for winter, he must earn enough money to obtain the supplies he needs. Marty Meierotto, his wife Dominique and their daughter Noah live in the small Alaskan town of Two Rivers. Every month, Marty pilots his bi-plane, traveling into the bush in search of the wolverine and lynx pelts he needs to make a living. While hes on the Black River, he must hunt moose and caribou to survive in the wilderness. Together, they represent Americas true MOUNTAIN MEN.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Pawn Stars

This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Chris Bledsoes daughter Emily purportedly has similar abilities to her father--and when the team combines her with Chris at the Monroe Institute and the Florida Everglades, the confounding results are truly out of this world.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. programme.title: Storage Wars

Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Engineering Disasters
programme.desc: Engineering has built our modern world. Everything from skyscrapers to roads and air travel are here because of Engineering. But what happens when engineering goes horribly wrong? Engineering Disasters goes beyond the headlines to uncover what really happened in the most notorious engineering accidents. What caused an outdoor stage to collapse in Indiana, killing seven? How did a collection of classic Corvettes disappear right out of thin air? Why did a planes fuselage rip open in mid-flight? What was behind the collapse of a domed stadium? Each hour long episode combines expert and eyewitness interviews, state of the art graphics, and dramatic "moment of disaster" footage to tell the story behind the worlds most terrifying engineering disasters.

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. They will also investigate how these recent disasters compare and contrast with the most historic natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: Engineering an Empire
programme.desc: Documentary series, hosted by Peter Weller, an actor and a professor at Syracuse University, that explores the engineering and architectural achievements that were characteristic of some of the greatest civilizations on this planet - Rome, Egypt, Greece, the Aztecs, the Maya, Russia, China, the Persians, the Byzantines, Britain, France, and Italy in the late 15th and 16th centuries. Using interviews with experts, re-enactments, and computer-generated graphics, this programme looks at various structures, buildings and mechanical inventions, from Menes dam built in around 3000 BC in Egypt to the worlds first locomotive invented in Britain.

programme.title: The Best of MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Sightings of serpentine creatures lurking in dark waters around the globe have been documented for centuries. The MonsterQuest team investigates two legends in an attempt to uncover the truth of what lies below the surface.

programme.title: The Best of MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Large and dangerous cats are stalking suburban neighbourhoods throughout the United States. The MonsterQuest investigation team goes undercover to examine evidence and eyewitness accounts to reveal the identity of this beast before it kills again.

programme.title: Missing in Alaska
programme.desc: Less famous, but even more perilous than the Bermuda Triangle, the so-called Alaska Triangle is one of the most enigmatic places in the world, with more than 20 000 missing-person cases recorded over the last 50 years. Intrigued by the secrets of this strange locality, a team of experts and investigators will join forces in order to solve the mystery and provide the scientific explanation for each case they explore.

programme.title: Rome: Rise and Fall of an Empire
programme.desc: A television documentary series which tells the full story of the origins, development and downfall of the famous Roman Empire between the 2nd century BC to the era of the last Western Roman emperor in the 5th century AD. The Romans are regarded as one of the most revolutionary Empires in the entire course of history and a substantial amount of theories, principles and engineering techniques they experimented with are still applied to this day. This thirteen-part series explores the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars which ultimately led to the fall of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: An FBI cold case that has laid dormant for 70 years leads a group of world-renown investigators on the ultimate manhunt to finally answer the question: Did Adolf Hitler survive World War II? In early 2014 the FBI declassified hundreds of confidential documents showing that Hitler may have not committed suicide but rather escaped to South America after the fall of Germany. A memo from J. Edgar Hoover himself states "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Armed with the most cutting edge technology and these newly released FBI files the team will approach this case like a modern death claims investigation. Whether they are investigating a mysterious Nazi lair deep in the Argentinian jungle or diving for evidence of a missing U-Boat that could of shuttled Hitler to South America our team will focus on the tried and tested tenants for solving a fraudulent death case: follow the money where was the subject last seen, eyewitness reports, make contact with known associates and forensics.With declassified worldwide intelligence providing a wealth of new clues and modern technology never before available we reopen this world famous cold case in hopes of solving the mystery surrounding the demise of one of the biggest criminals of all time.

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. They will also investigate how these recent disasters compare and contrast with the most historic natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: In major cities around the world today, skyscrapers loom overhead, taxis honk their horns and street vendors peddle their wares. But below lies city upon city - each with its fascinating and unknown history. This series will explore these layers, which are often hundreds of feet deep, and examine a citys ancient cisterns, dank dungeons, eerie tombs, clandestine hideouts, and even underground shipwrecks that have been lost for hundreds and hundreds of years. What are the underground layers of the most populated cities on earth? And how did (and do) engineers build layer upon layer up to todays city streets? This series will reveal the technological marvels that allowed the construction of one city upon another - literally.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Every day, new information is discovered that helps us better understand how our Universe works. Some of this evidence solves mysteries dating back thousands of years. Some evidence offers new theories on how human civilization came into existence. In this season of The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved, well tackle mysteries such as an American Stonehenge built 500 years before Columbus, and how the Aztec Pyramids helped seal the downfall of the Mayan and Aztec empires. Well also look at some of the Roman Empires most iconic structures, and their connection to archeo-astronomy.

programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Ancient Discoveries
programme.desc: Have a look at the technologies from the past. You will be surprised to find out in what extent ancient knowledge influences modern technology. The truth about the past is much more complicated and fascinating than we imagine. This eye-opening series is filmed on location in Italy, Greece, Egypt, Holland, and England, and other locations of the world where historical events actually happened, and with the help of computer animation ancient machines and mechanisms are reconstructed. As well the series uses contributions from archaeologists and other experts, footage of historical sites and artifacts and dramatized reconstructions.

programme.title: Ancient Top
programme.desc: Ancient Top 10 is smart, fun countdown that details how ancient technology worked, how surprisingly advanced it was, and how it was kind of awesome. Location shooting, CGI, and graphics are pulled from past History series Ancient Impossible and Ancient Discoveries, and lists are organized by themes. The stories are augmented by new entries fueled by the History archive. Episodes include updated "Top Ten" graphics and new interviews that provide "wow" facts and explain why something made the list. The lists will have organizing principles so it doesnt seem arbitrary. Episodes could include the following: Top 10 Secrets of Egypt, Top 10 Ancient Vikings, Top 10 Greek Inventions, Top 10 Ancient Weapons, Top 10 Ancient Monuments, Top 10 Ancient Ships, Top 10 Torture Devices, Top 10 Roman Inventions, Top 10 Ancient Swords, and Top 10 Ancient Sieges.

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: The Curse of Civil War Gold is a non-fiction series about American Civil War history. Michigan native, part time treasure hunter Kevin Dykstra and his team search for lost treasures of Civil War Gold, estimated to be worth millions of dollars. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. Later it was smuggled north and ended up in Lake Michigan. And this is exactly where Kevin and his crew head to.

programme.title: Valley Of the Damned
programme.desc: Documentary series that investigates seven murders that occured at the beautiful mountain region of Fremont County, deep in the Colorado Rocky Mountains. This vast, inhospitable region of Southern Colorado is known as Prison Valley because it is home to 15 prisons including Americas only Federal Supermax - the most secure prison in the system. Family, police, witnesses, lawyers and journalists come together to discuss the murders, as each episode tells a raw and emotional story of twisted and psychologically complex homicide that took place in Prison Valley.

programme.title: Valley Of the Damned
programme.desc: Documentary series that investigates seven murders that occured at the beautiful mountain region of Fremont County, deep in the Colorado Rocky Mountains. This vast, inhospitable region of Southern Colorado is known as Prison Valley because it is home to 15 prisons including Americas only Federal Supermax - the most secure prison in the system. Family, police, witnesses, lawyers and journalists come together to discuss the murders, as each episode tells a raw and emotional story of twisted and psychologically complex homicide that took place in Prison Valley.

programme.title: Blood Relatives
programme.desc: It is often easy to regard other families as picture perfect, harmonious examples of pillars of the community. But sometimes, these facades hide dreadful criminal intent and gruesome violence. Brenda Strong narrates this show which exposes murderous secrets hidden within the family unit. Each epsiode explores a separate story involving a family tragedy and reveals the motives of other family members who are potential suspects in the crime. From sibling rivalry to conflicts over money to jealousy and infidelity, there are many factors involved which can lead to a family member paying the ultimate price. The skilled story-telling will draw the viewer in and keep them on the edge of their seat as they try to guess who the killer is.

programme.title: Mother, May I Murder?
programme.desc: When the heir-apparent to a Colorado ranch suddenly disappears, his family doesnt seem to care. Police quickly uncover a body and a vicious family feud.

programme.title: Mother, May I Murder?
programme.desc: The murder of a father devastates his family. But when his widow and her son turn the home into a sex party house, it exposes a very different reality.

programme.title: The Lost Boys of Bucks County
programme.desc: In July 2017 four young men from a peaceful Pennsylvania farming community mysteriously vanished in the space of less than a week. What happened to them?

programme.title: Still A Mystery
programme.desc: A mum and her 10-year-old son are shot dead in their home. A note at the scene tells one story, but the truth may be something entirely different.

programme.title: Still A Mystery
programme.desc: When a young mum disappears, theres no shortage of men in town for police to question. And, a seven-month-old baby is taken from his crib.

programme.title: The Curious Case Of Natalia Grace
programme.desc: As Michaels trial approaches, he shifts fault to Kristine. He has a glimmer of hope when the judge throws out any discussion of Natalias age during the trial.

programme.title: The Curious Case Of Natalia Grace
programme.desc: After years of anticipation, Michaels trial is finally underway. A mysterious new witness appears and offers damning testimony that could ruin Michael.

programme.title: I Almost Got Away With It
programme.desc: Different crimes, different stories one clear motive: to stay out of prison. This series profiles true stories of the accused, who tried to avoided arrest and capture for their crime. Almost getting away with it. Following these convicts and their attempts and successions of escaping American prisons after being sentenced. Some are on the run for only a week, others evade the law for years and in rare cases even for decades. What pushed these fugitives to crime and to what extent are willing to go to avoid justice.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: If you looked into the eyes of a killer, would you know? In American Monster, you find out. For the first time, viewers get closer than ever to some of Americas most shocking and surprising crimes. Filled with never-before-seen footage of these devils in disguise, from home movie shots of them playing with their kids to musical performances at high school, from the church cook-out to the wedding video, American Monster interweaves twisting-turning stories of astonishing crimes, with behind-the-scenes footage of killers at their seemingly most innocent.

programme.title: Who Hired the Hitman?
programme.desc: After a killer strikes a Louisiana farmer, police examine a pilfering maid, a withdrawn farmhand and a duplicitous wife, all with a motive for murder.

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: A true-crime series with a twist; it focuses on crimes that are committed in the homes of the victims. Although our homes are supposed to be our sanctuary, a place where you can feel totally safe and secure, often when you are alone, the most comforting of houses can be transformed into a more mysterious, sinister and scary place to be. Mysterious noises and discomfitting shadows can cause fear and apprehension to grow at a debilitating rate and this show details real-life tales of suspense, revenge and horror. Episodes include two newlyweds confronting three masked men who put their Christian faith to the test; a high school senior whose ex-boyfriend breaks into her home with a bottle of gasoline and a lighter; and a single mother who is taken hostage in her own house.

programme.title: Relatively Evil
programme.desc: Documentary series that features six terrifying cases of family dynamics turning deadly. Relatively evil explores the real-life stories of outsiders who fell in love with someone in a seemingly normal family but soon found themselves entangled with an evil clan capable of abuse, kidnapping, or something even more sinister. Each episode features a true crime murder mystery where the pool of suspects are all from within the family.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here: The Killer Speaks
programme.desc: After years apart, Jamie-Lee reunites with her father, Isakin, the "Skara Cannibal," to confront him on the infamous, brutal murder of his girlfriend.

programme.title: Never Say Goodbye
programme.desc: A true-crime show which details the horrific events of the murder from the perspective of the last person to see the victim alive, whether that be a loving spouse or a cherished family member. The series describes such heartbreaking stories as the disappearance of a beloved stepmother whose once perfect life has been torn apart; the mysterious world of a retired schoolteacher who vanishes leaving his daughter to uncover the dark secrets of his double life; the discovery, by her husband, of a brutally murdered young wife lying dead close to their infant daughter; the exposure of the dark underbelly of a small town when a local father finds his teen daughter mercilessly killed and has to fight for justice.

programme.title: Last Night in...
programme.desc: Investigations of real-life murders which occurred during nighttime in different towns across America. Night is the part of the day when its easiest for dangerous killers to catch their victims. Individuals who find themselves alone in the dark become targets of horrible predators who are looking for an opportunity to kill. In the morning their loved ones are looking for them desperately.

programme.title: Музыкальная интуиция
programme.desc: Уникальное шоу, в котором 10 незнакомцев делают вид, что умеют петь, хотя на самом деле это утверждение правдиво лишь наполовину. Двум звёздным командам из комиков и музыкантов предстоит провести расследование, чтобы отличить певцов от лжецов и выиграть главный приз, который затем отправится в благотворительные фонды.

programme.title: Эксы
programme.desc: Мы разошлись, но не можем друг без друга? Что это - любовь или привычка? Мы готовы на все, чтобы разобраться в наших чувствах. Участники - 10 пар бывших . Они жили вместе, любили друг друга, но по разным причинам - расстались. И все они так и не смогли "завязать" с отношениями. Их по-прежнему тянет друг к другу, они общаются, видятся, многие занимаются сексом. Что это - болезненная зависимость, привычка или любовь? На протяжении проекта пары бывших будут проходить испытания, которые помогут раскрыть их характеры, отношение друг к другу, вскроют самые сокровенные тайны и секреты. Та пара, которая пройдет все испытания и разберется до конца в себе и в своих отношениях, получит крупный денежный приз.

programme.title: Азия
programme.desc: Что вы знаете о Центральной Азии? То, что эти страны когда-то входили в состав СССР, и то, что люди сейчас там живут бедно, живут в кишлаках и ездят на ослах, мечтают переехать в Россию и работать там, пьют только зеленый чай и едят плов и мясо, притесняют людей других национальностей? Мы решили развеять самые распространенные мифы о Центральной Азии, а также рассказать о забытых традициях и блюдах, которые шокируют иностранцев, а иногда даже самих местных.

programme.title: Ждём в гости
programme.desc: Проект Ирины Хангошвили о культуре, истории и традициях различных стран мира. Ведущий - Зураб Двали - путешествует и приглашает зрителей пройтись вместе с ним по красивым местам, увидеть достопримечательности, полюбоваться природой и познакомиться с интересными людьми. Всюду гостеприимные хозяева говорят нашим телезрителям: "Ждем в гости!" Зрители сначала узнают интересные исторические факты о самых известных или забытых регионах различных стран, и затем останавливаются на кулинарных традициях - готовят несколько блюд с гостями программы.

programme.title: Друзья
programme.desc: В пятом сезоне друзья возвращаются в Нью-Йорк. Росс уже продал свою квартиру, он переезжает к Чендлеру и Джо. Пожив у них некоторое время, он переселяется в квартиру из дома напротив. Фиби рожает тройню. Отношения Чендлера и Моники становятся серьёзными. Рэйчел получает новую работу в компании Ральфа Лорена. Джо получает главную роль в фильме и уезжает на съёмки в Лас-Вегас. Друзья отправляются туда, чтобы навестить его, но выясняется, что съёмки отменили и Джо работает в одном из казино. Чендлер и Моника собираются там пожениться.

programme.title: Друзья
programme.desc: В пятом сезоне друзья возвращаются в Нью-Йорк. Росс уже продал свою квартиру, он переезжает к Чендлеру и Джо. Пожив у них некоторое время, он переселяется в квартиру из дома напротив. programme.title: Холодное блюдо
programme.desc: Когда жених Жени Олег погибает в автокатастрофе по вине пьяного водителя, то она жаждет только одного: чтобы Костю Стрельцова, совершившего наезд, посадили надолго. Но этого не случается, так как шалопай Костя - сын местного олигарха, и отец неоднократно спасал его от ответственности. Тогда Женя решает, что свершит правосудие сама и добьется того, чтобы Костя оказался за решеткой...

programme.title: Холодное блюдо

programme.title: Верю я в любовь
programme.desc: Накануне свадьбы дочери швея Надежда Матвеева застаёт своего мужа Геннадия с молодой любовницей. Надежда уходит из дома, но не находит поддержки ни у дочери Даши, ни у своей матери Ольги Авдеевны, которые убеждают её закрыть глаза на измену. Однако вернуться домой и жить как прежде Надежда не в силах, ведь мужа она никогда не любила и жила с ним только из чувства благодарности. Когда-то Геннадий женился на ней, зная, что она беременна от другого. Спустя двадцать лет, оказавшись на перепутье, Надежда решается разыскать свою первую и единственную любовь — Ивана Гаврилова, отца Даши.

programme.desc: Накануне свадьбы дочери швея Надежда Матвеева застаёт своего мужа Геннадия с молодой любовницей. Надежда уходит из дома, но не находит поддержки ни у дочери Даши, ни у своей матери Ольги Авдеевны, которые убеждают её закрыть глаза на измену. Однако вернуться домой и жить как прежде Надежда не в силах, ведь мужа она никогда не любила и жила с ним только из чувства благодарности. Когда-то Геннадий женился на ней, зная, что она беременна от другого. Спустя двадцать лет, оказавшись на перепутье, Надежда решается разыскать свою первую и единственную любовь — Ивана Гаврилова, отца Даши.

programme.title: Орёл и Решка. Земляне
programme.desc: Орел и Решка станет первым тревел-шоу, которое откроет остров Сокотру и его жителей всему миру. Чтобы ее снять ведущим пришлось пойти на обман. Кирилл Макашов покажет главный символ острова Сокотра - драконовое дерево. Его рисуют на вывесках, бутылках с водой и даже номерных знаках. Тем временем Michelle Andrade посетит город Хадибо, где познакомится с местными, которые не знают своего возраста и интересно здороваются.

programme.title: Анатомия убийства
programme.desc: Евгения и Сергей расстались, но она осталась работать патологоанатомом в местной полиции по приглашению следователя Перфильева. Сергей Карский получил возможность наслаждаться славой. После публикации его романа, который он написал не без участия Евгении, но что-то в их отношениях сломалось. Его друг, встретившись с Женей по работе, был крайне удивлён таким течением событий. Прекрасный специалист в своём деле Евгения продолжает раскрывать запутанные преступления, и Карский всегда готов оказаться рядом с ней во время поисков разгадок. Перфильев внимательнейшим образом относится ко всем предположениям талантливой коллеги...

programme.title: Плевако
programme.desc: Москва, вторая половина XIX века. Блестящий адвокат Плевако на самом пике славы. Только ему под силу выиграть в суде за пять минут, одержать победу на спор или же обернуть в свою пользу заведомо безнадёжное дело. Плевако тщеславен, смел и считает себя неуязвимым, беспечно обрастая могущественными врагами. Но продолжая блистать в суде, он все больше запутывается в собственной жизни. Когда его мир начнет рушиться, защищать ему придется уже самого себя.

programme.title: Неизвестная Россия
programme.desc: Aвторский проект Вадима Кондакова. Это получасовые документальные истории о местах и людях, о которых мало кто знает. И которые станут для зрителя настоящим открытием. Автор побывал в самой самой западной точке страны, в Калининграде, где люди, без света и воды, живут в казематах заброшенного немецкого форта XIX века. И на далеких Курильских островах, в городе-призраке, про жителей которых почему-то забыли на материке. Кроме того, "Неизвестная Россия" расскажет о том, что за таинственный сигнал из космоса поймали в астрофизической обсерватории Нижнего Архыза. И можно ли стать дорожным полицейским, если ты родился в городе дальнобойщиков. В общем, "Неизвестная Россия" показывает страну такой, какой ее не знают даже сами россияне.

programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: Ученые намерены регенерировать живые ткани с помощью 3D-биопечати. В Калифорнии разработали специальное охлаждающее покрытие для дорог. Начата борьба с космическим мусором около Луны: как это происходит. Подземная инфраструктура городов нагревается.

programme.title: Ольга
programme.desc: В семействе Терентьевых все как обычно - "весело и с огоньком". Аня пытается расставить приоритеты для своего возлюбленного Льва, для которого, как обычно, общественное выше личного. Возмужавший Тимофей настроен решить проблемы Саши, которые ей подкидывает отец Жора. Лена всеми силами помогает Пушкину дембельнуться раньше времени, и для этого просит помощи у его брата — Митяя. Чича и Романыч очень переживают за Юргена, который находится в депрессии после смерти жены. И только у Ольги всё хорошо… Или нет?

programme.title: Ольга
programme.desc: У Юргена большие проблемы, на него собираются подавать в суд за сорванные похороны. Гриша решительно настроен помочь отцу бывшей возлюбленной и уладить все полюбовно с пострадавшей стороной. Аня в борьбе за внимание Льва начинает совершать "добрые дела", но для нее открывается неприятная правда. Юрген решительно настроен застолбить себе место на кладбище рядом с Томой, он готов на все, даже на похищение человека. Ольга же позволяет семейству набивать "свои шишки" и посвящает всё время себе любимой.

programme.title: Детство Шелдона
programme.desc: История о непростом детстве вундеркинда Шелдона Купера. Родители юного гения не разделяют увлечения сына наукой: его мать очень религиозна, а отец, бывший футбольный тренер, предпочитает проводить вечера в компании пива и телевизора. Со сверстниками тоже не ладится, ведь Шелдона куда больше детских игрушек интересует, где можно взять обогащённый уран для научных экспериментов.

programme.title: Детство Шелдона
programme.desc: История о непростом детстве вундеркинда Шелдона Купера. Родители юного гения не разделяют увлечения сына наукой: его мать очень религиозна, а отец, бывший футбольный тренер, предпочитает проводить вечера в компании пива и телевизора. Со сверстниками тоже не ладится, ведь Шелдона куда больше детских игрушек интересует, где можно взять обогащённый уран для научных экспериментов.
